BriefDescription: The number of all operations received by the HHA
The number of all operations received by the HHA from another socket
The number of all operations received by the HHA from another SCCL in this socket
Count of the number of operations that HHA has received from CCIX
Count of the number of WriteBackI operations that HHA has received
Count of the number of WriteBackIPtl operations that HHA has received
Count of the number of WriteThruIStash operations that HHA has received
The number of read operations sent by HHA to DDRC which size is 64 bytes
The number of write operations sent by HHA to DDRC which size is 64 bytes
The number of read operations sent by HHA to DDRC which size is 128 bytes
The number of write operations sent by HHA to DDRC which size is 128 bytes
Count of the number of spill operations that the HHA has sent
Count of the number of successful spill operations that the HHA has sent
Count of the number of HHA BackInvalid operations
Count of the number of Mediated operations that the HHA has forwarded
Count of the number of Snoop operations that the HHA has sent
Count of the number of Snoop operations that the HHA has sent to another socket
Count of the number of Snoop operations that the HHA has sent to CCIX
Count of the number of SnprspData flit operations that HHA has received
Count of the number of SnprspData operations that HHA has received from another socket
Count of the number of HHA S-Dir lookup operations
Count of the number of HHA E-Dir lookup operations
Count of the number of HHA S-Dir hit operations
Count of the number of HHA E-Dir hit operations
Count of the number of HHA S-Dir read home migrate operations
Count of the number of HHA E-Dir read home migrate operations
